page.title: 04Schools in Ribchester
page.content: Our school is called Ribchester C.E. school,it is quite small,it only has 38 children and two teachers. It was built in 1871 with a new extension in 1978. It is a Church of England school. The school has only three classrooms and a hall. We visited St Peters and St Pauls school in the village,to ask some questions. They have eighteen children and four rooms they also have two teachers.It opened about 130 years ago. All the children will go to our school in September. We went to the Playgroup to ask some questions. There are twenty-four children. Their mums stay with them. The children are aged 2-4, go to Playgroup on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 9.30- 12.00 . They paint pictures and play games.
